title: Code of Conduct for wandR
text: interest fostering open welcoming environment, contributors maintainers pledge making participation project community harassment-free experience everyone, regardless age, disability, ethnicity, gender identity expression, level experience, nationality, personal appearance, race, religion, sexual identity orientation.

title: Code of Conduct for wandR
text: Examples behavior contributes creating positive environment include: Using welcoming inclusive language respectful differing viewpoints experiences Gracefully accepting constructive criticism Focusing best community Showing empathy towards community members Examples unacceptable behavior participants include: Trolling, insulting/derogatory comments, personal political attacks Public private harassment Publishing others’ private information use sexualized language imagery unwelcome sexual attention advances conduct reasonably considered inappropriate professional setting

title: Code of Conduct for wandR
text: Project maintainers responsible clarifying standards acceptable behavior expected take appropriate fair corrective action response instances unacceptable behavior. Project maintainers right responsibility remove, edit, reject comments, commits, code, wiki edits, issues, contributions aligned Code Conduct, ban temporarily permanently contributor behaviors deem inappropriate, threatening, offensive, harmful.

title: Code of Conduct for wandR
text: Code Conduct adapted Contributor Covenant, version 1.4, available https://www.contributor-covenant.org/version/1/4/code--conduct.html.

title: Contributing to wandR
text: welcome contributions wandR package! Whether ’re looking report bug, suggest enhancement, contribute code, help appreciated. document provides guidelines contributing wandR.

title: Contributing to wandR
text: reporting issue, please following: - Check issue tracker ensure issue hasn’t already reported. - Update latest version wandR see issue fixed. reporting issue, please include: - clear descriptive title. - detailed description problem, including error messages. - Steps reproduce issue. - expected behavior versus observed.

title: Contributing to wandR
text: ’re always looking suggestions improve wandR! Enhancement suggestions tracked GitHub issues. suggesting enhancement, include: - clear descriptive title. - detailed explanation proposed feature improvement. - examples enhancement used.

title: Contributing to wandR
text: ’re looking contribute code, ’s get started: 1. Fork repository GitHub clone fork locally. 2. Install package locally ensure builds correctly. 3. Create new branch contribution. 4. Make changes. Keep code clean clear possible. 5. Test changes. Ensure changes break existing functionality. 6. Commit changes. Use clear descriptive commit messages. 7. Push changes fork GitHub. 8. Submit pull request. Include clear detailed description changes.

title: Contributing to wandR
text: Documentation updates included changes functionality. Added updated necessary tests. Ran package checks ensure regression.

title: Contributing to wandR
text: Participants wandR project expected follow Code Conduct, can found CODE CONDUCT. code outlines expectations behavior within project’s community.

title: Contributing to wandR
text: questions need assistance, feel free reach creating issue GitHub repository. ’ll best help ! Thank contributing wandR!

what: Rename funtions to Harry Potter spells
title: Rename funtions to Harry Potter spells
text: wandR package designed transform R learning entertaining journey , weaving magic wizarding world R programming. Inspired spells Harry Potter series, presents collection functions tailored educational purposes. wandR, users engage data manipulation function names echo charm whimsy wizardry, thus making mastery essential data wrangling functions captivating enjoyable.

title: Rename funtions to Harry Potter spells
text: can install wandR GitHub :

title: Rename funtions to Harry Potter spells
text: accio(.data, ...): Summons rows dataset meet specified conditions. transfiguro(.data, ...): Transforms adds new variables dataframe. reducio(data, cols, names_to, values_to, ...): Condenses wide data longer format. engorgio(data, names_from, values_from, ...): Spreads key-value pairs across multiple columns widen data. daily_prophet(.data, ...): Generates summary statistics. avada_kedavra(...): Irreversibly removes objects environment, use caution.

title: Rename funtions to Harry Potter spells
text: ’s quick example get started:
code: library(wandR)  data(harry_potter_characters.rda)  # Use accio to filter rows gryffindor_students <- accio(harry_potter_characters, house == "Gryffindor")  # Transform data with transfiguro new_star_data <- transfiguro(harry_potter_characters, ID = nrow())

Rowling.

code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ library(dplyr) # Assuming star_data is a data frame with columns: name, house, and year accio(star_data, house == "Gryffindor") } # }

title: Avada Kedavra - Remove Objects from the Environment — avada_kedavra
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ x <- 42 y <- "The answer" z <- list(a = 1, b = 2) # Remove x and y from the environment # avada_kedavra("x", "y") # Note: Running this example will remove x and y permanently. } # }

title: daily_prophet - Create Summary Statistics — daily_prophet
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ library(dplyr) # Assuming potion_data is a data frame with columns: ingredient, quantity, and effect_strength daily_prophet(potion_data, total_quantity = sum(quantity), average_strength = mean(effect_strength)) } # }

text: engorgio spell expands data frame, spreading key-value pairs across multiple columns, thus making dataset wider. akin magical process enlarging objects, data frames, using tidyr::pivot_wider(). function particularly useful want transform long-format data wide-format, making easier analyze visualize.

Engorgio - Spread Key-Value Pairs to Widen Data — engorgio
text: data data frame tibble wish transform wider format. names_from column data contains variable names spread across new columns wider format. values_from column data contains values fill new columns created spreading names_from. ... Additional arguments passed tidyr::pivot_wider().

title: Engorgio - Spread Key-Value Pairs to Widen Data — engorgio

title: Engorgio - Spread Key-Value Pairs to Widen Data — engorgio
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ library(tidyr) # Assuming a data frame `long_data` with columns: id, category, value engorgio(long_data, names_from = "category", values_from = "value") } # }

title: Harry Potter Characters Dataset (hp_characters) — hp_characters
text: dataset contains information key characters Harry Potter series. includes house affiliations, roles within wizarding world, special abilities, known Patronuses. designed provide comprehensive overview character's unique attributes educational analytical purposes, especially fans series looking explore data R.

title: Harry Potter Characters Dataset (hp_characters) — hp_characters
Harry Potter Characters Dataset (hp_characters) — hp_characters
text: data frame 15 rows 5 variables: Name character: name character. House character: Hogwarts house character belongs (Gryffindor, Slytherin, Ravenclaw, Hufflepuff). Role character: character's role occupation within wizarding world (e.g., Student, Professor, Headmaster). Special_Abilities character: Unique magical abilities skills character known (e.g., Parseltongue, Animagus). Patronus character: form character's Patronus, known. 'None' indicates Patronus known applicable.

title: Harry Potter Characters Dataset (hp_characters) — hp_characters
text: Derived Harry Potter series J.K. Rowling.

title: Reducio - Condense Wide Data into Long Format — reducio
text: reducio magically condenses wide-format data longer, detailed format, mirroring functionality tidyr::pivot_longer(). function ideal gathering multiple columns key-value pairs, thereby stretching data frame vertically reducing width.

title: Reducio - Condense Wide Data into Long Format — reducio
Reducio - Condense Wide Data into Long Format — reducio
text: data data frame tibble wish transform longer format. cols Columns data want condense longer format. Can specified using dplyr select helpers like everything(), starts_with(), ends_with(), etc. names_to name new column long format contain names condensed columns. Defaults "name". values_to name new column long format contain values condensed columns. Defaults "value". ... Additional arguments passed tidyr::pivot_longer().

title: Reducio - Condense Wide Data into Long Format — reducio
text: longer, detailed data frame tibble specified wide-format columns condensed two columns: one variable names (names_to) one values (values_to).

Transfiguro - Transform or Add New Variables to a Data Frame — transfiguro

title: Transfiguro - Transform or Add New Variables to a Data Frame — transfiguro
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ library(dplyr) # Assuming star_data is a data frame with columns: name, house, and year transfiguro(star_data, age_next_year = year + 1) } # }
